content: next single_crochet single_crochet in last chain 1 turn 2 single_crochet 15 decrease chain 1 slip_stitch in top 16 slip_stitch chain 1 at leaf margin points slipstitch to center make chain for stem or slip_stitch to other side and fasten_off weave in ends variation this is deliberately asymmetrical if you prefer more symmetry and sometimes i do depends on the yarn-- read pattern and work the first lobe the same as the last for row 6 skip first single_crochet single_crochet skip next single_crochet single_crochet in last single_crochet chain 1 turn then decrease chain 1 slip_stitch in top slip_stitch to base the image shows stem petiole #4 stem #4 chain 2 single_crochet in first chain chain 1 turn single_crochet *chain 1 turn single_crochet* repeat for desired length copyright 2009-2013 by akua lezli hope all rights to this work are reserved to the copyright owner under this copyright you are able to print one copy for your personal use do not distribute this file electronically or print more than one copy of this file do not sell or share this pattern if you have any questions or comments contact akua@artfarm com
